Song.title: Be Thou My Vision
Song.copyright: Words by Mary Byrne Music traditional Irish melody Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Be Thou my [A]vision, O [Bm]Lord of [A]my [D]heart [A]Naught be all [D]else to me, [Bm]save that [D]Thou [A]art [G]Thou my best [Bm]thought by [A]day or by [Bm]ni[A]ght [D]Waking or [G]slee[Bm]ping, Thy [Em]presence [A7sus]my [D]light
Verse 2: [D]Be Thou my [A]Wisdom, And [Bm]Thou my [A]true [D]Word [A]I ever [D]with Thee and [Bm]Thou with [D]me, [A]Lord [G]Thou my great [Bm]Father and [A]I Thy true [Bm]s[A]on [D]Thou in me [G]dwel[Bm]ling and [Em]I with [A7sus]Thee [D]one
Verse 3: [D]Be Thou my [A]breastplate, my [Bm]sword for [A]the [D]fight. [A]Be Thou my [D]armour and [Bm]be Thou [D]my [A]might. [G]Thou my soul's [Bm]shelter, and [A]Thou my high [Bm]to[A]wer; [D]Raise Thou me [G]heaven[Bm]ward, O [Em]Power of [A7sus]my [D]power.
Verse 4: [D]Riches I [A]heed not, Nor [Bm]man’s emp[A]ty [D]praise [A]Thou my in[D]heritance [Bm]now and [D]al[A]ways [G]Thou and Thou [Bm]only, [A]first in my [Bm]hea[A]rt [D]High King of [G]hea[Bm]ven, My [Em]Treasure [A7sus]Thou [D]art [Bsus B]
{key:E} Verse 5: [E]High King of [B]heaven, my [C#m]victo[B]ry [E]won [B]May I reach [E]heaven’s joys,{,} [C#m]O bright [E]heaven’s [B]Sun [A]Heart of my [C#m]own heart, what[B]ever be[C#m B]fall [E]Still be my [A]vi[C#m]sion, O [F#m]Ruler [B7sus]of [E]all
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 be thou my vision o lord of my heart naught be all else to me save that thou art thou my best thought by day or by night waking or sleeping thy presence my light verse 2 be thou my wisdom and thou my true word i ever with thee and thou with me lord thou my great father and i thy true son thou in me dwelling and i with thee one verse 3 be thou my breastplate my sword for the fight be thou my armour and be thou my might thou my souls shelter and thou my high tower raise thou me heavenward o power of my power verse 4 riches i heed not nor mans empty praise thou my inheritance now and always thou and thou only first in my heart high king of heaven my treasure thou art verse 5 high king of heaven my victory won may i reach heavens joys o bright heavens sun heart of my own heart whatever befall still be my vision o ruler of all

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [D]Be Thou my [G]vi[A]sion, O [Bm]Lord of [A/C#]my [D]heart [Em]Naught be all [D/F#]else to me, [Gmaj7]save thatThou [Asus A]art [G]Thou my best [Bm]thought by [F#m7]day or by [G]ni[A]ght [Bm]Waking or [F#m]sleeping, Thy [G6]pre[G/A]sence my [D Em/D D E/D]light
Verse 2: [D]Be Thou my [G]Wis[A]dom, And [Bm]Thou my [AC#]true [D]Word [Em]I ever [D/F#]with Thee and [Gmaj7]Thou with me, [Asus A]Lord [G]Thou my great [Bm]Father and [F#m]I Thy true [G]so[A]n [Bm]Thou in me [F#m7]dwelling and [G6]I [G/A]with Thee [D Em/D D E/D]one
Verse 3: [D]Riches I [G]heed [A]not, Nor [Bm]man’s emp[A/C#]ty [D]praise [Em]Thou my in[D/F#]heritance [Gmaj7]now and al[Asus A]ways [G]Thou and Thou [Bm]only, [F#m]first in my [G]hea[A]rt [Bm]High King of [F#m7]heaven, My [G6]Trea[G/A]sure Thou [D Em/D D E/D]art
Verse 5: [D]High King of [G]hea[A]ven, my [Bm]victo[A/C#]ry [D]won [Em]May I reach [D/F#]heaven’s joys, [Gmaj7]O bright heaven’s [Asus A]Sun [G]Heart of my [Bm]own heart, what[F#m]ever be[G A]fall [Bm]Still be my [F#m7]vision, O [G6]Ru[G/A]ler of [D Em/D D E/D]all
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 be thou my vision o lord of my heart naught be all else to me save thatthou art thou my best thought by day or by night waking or sleeping thy presence my light verse 2 be thou my wisdom and thou my true word i ever with thee and thou with me lord thou my great father and i thy true son thou in me dwelling and i with thee one verse 3 riches i heed not nor mans empty praise thou my inheritance now and always thou and thou only first in my heart high king of heaven my treasure thou art verse 5 high king of heaven my victory won may i reach heavens joys o bright heavens sun heart of my own heart whatever befall still be my vision o ruler of all

Verse 2: [D]Be Thou my [Bm]Wisdom, And [G]Thou my [A/C#]true [Bm]Word [A]I ever [A/F#]with [D/F#]Thee and [G]Thou with [D/G]me, [A]Lord [Bm]Thou my great [D6/A D/A]Father and [G6 G] I Thy true [A2 A]son [Bm]Thou in [D/B]me [D/A]dwelling [Bm]and [G6] I [G]with [G/A]Thee [D | G6 G | D | G6 G]one
Verse 3: [D]Riches I [Bm]heed not, Nor [G]man’s em[A/C#]pty [Bm]praise [A]Thou my in[A/F# D/F#]her - itance [G]now and [D/G A]al - ways [Bm]Thou and Thou [D6/A D/A]o ---- nly, [G2]first [G]in my [A2 A]heart [Bm]High King [D/B]of [D/A]heaven, [Bm]my [G6 G]Treasure [G/A]Thou [D | G6 G | D | G6 G]art
Verse 5: [D]High King of [Bm]heaven, my [G]victo[A/C#]ry [Bm]won [A]May I reach [A/F#]hea - [D/F#]ven’s joys, [G]O bright h[D/G]eaven’s [A]Sun [Bm]Heart of my [D6/A]own [D/A]heart, what[G2 G]ever be[A2 A]fall [Bm]Still be my [D/B D/A]vi -- sion, [Bm]O [G6]Ru[G]ler [G/A]of [D | G6 G | D | G6 G]all
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 be thou my vision o lord of my heart naught be all else to me save that thou art thou my best thou ght by day or by night waking or sleeping thy presence my light verse 2 be thou my wisdom and thou my true word i ever with thee and thou with me lord thou my great father and i thy true son thou in me dwelling and i with thee one verse 3 riches i heed not nor mans empty praise thou my inher itance now and al ways thou and thou o nly first in my heart high king of heaven my treasure thou art verse 5 high king of heaven my victory won may i reach hea vens joys o bright heavens sun heart of my own heart whatever befall still be my vi sion o ruler of all

Verse 3: [D]Be Thou my [A]breastplate, my [Bm]sword for [A]the [D]fight. [A]Be Thou my [D]armour and [Bm]be Thou [D]my [A]might. [G]Thou my soul's [Bm]shelter, and [A]Thou my high [Bm]to[A]wer; [D]Raise Thou me [G]heaven[Bm]ward, O [Em]Power of [A7sus]my [D]power.

Verse 5: [D]High King of [A]heaven, my [Bm]victo[A]ry [D]won [A]May I reach [D]heaven’s joys,{,} [Bm]O bright [D]heaven’s [A]Sun [G]Heart of my [Bm]own heart, what[A]ever be[Bm A]fall [D]Still be my [G]vi[Bm]sion, O [Em]Ruler [A7sus]of [D]all

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [E]
Verse 1: [E]Be Thou my vision, O Lord of my heart [B]Naught be all else to me, [A]save that Thou [B]art [A]Thou my [C#m]best thou - ght by [E/G#]day or by [A B]night [E]Waking or [C#m]sleeping, Thy [A]presence [B]my [E]light
Verse 2: [E]Be Thou my Wisdom, And Thou my true Word [B]I ever with Thee and [A]Thou with me, [B]Lord [A]Thou my great [C#m]Father and [E/G#] I Thy true [A B]son [E]Thou in me [C#m]dwelling and [A] I with [B]Thee [E]one
Verse 3: [E]Riches I heed not, Nor man’s empty praise [B]Thou my inher - itance [A]now and al - [B]ways [A]Thou and Thou [C#m]o ---- nly, [E/G#]first in my [A B]heart [A]High King of [C#m]heaven, my [A]Treasure [B]Thou [E]art
Verse 5: [E]High King of heaven, my victory won [B]May I reach hea - ven’s joys, [A]O bright heaven’s [B]Sun [A]Heart of my [C#m]own heart, what[E/G#]ever be[A B]fall [A]Still be my [C#m]vi -- sion, O [G6]Ru[A]ler [B]of [E]all
